column1: The seminar leader was well prepared
column2: The seminar leader gave interesting and informative classes
column3: The seminar leader explained the subject clearly
column4: The seminar leader was effective in leading the class or seminar
column5: The seminar leader is receptive to students' questions
column6: The seminar leader stimulates interest in the subject
column7: The seminar leader stimulates discussion on the subject
column8: The seminar leader stimulates me to think and learn
column9: The seminar leader has a good rapport with the class
column10: The seminar leader is available to answer questions during office hours
column11: What have been the positive features of this module up to this point?
column12: Were there any negative features of this module up to this point? What aspects of the module might be improved?

column11: The tutor displayed commendable effort in actively involving the students and addressing their inquiries. It is worth noting that he maintained a friendly demeanor, treated students with respect, and made genuine attempts to involve as many students as possible.
column12: The tutor often conveyed a sense of hesitation which left students feeling uncertain about his confidence in providing in-depth responses to questions. His explanations tended to be swift, with transitions between topics occuring hastily, which hindered the students' ability to follow each step of a problem. While it was evident that he grasped the subject matter, his teaching approach did not effectively facilitate student comprehension.

column11: Hugo honestly explains everything in an incredibly straightforward way that makes my life so much easier. And he's so flexible and patient and good at teaching
column12: I have a hard time understanding the lectures sometimes but Hugo is great at explaining!

column11: The topic was new and interesting
column12: The final two Logic Topics were very difficult to understand during the lectures, thus many I know couldn't complete or submit the exercises.

column11: The way that information is presented is fairly digestible
column13: Loved Hugo, he was great and engaging!
